title: Polygon testnet mumbai cant add more block
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: 2.53.4 & downloaded snapshot
heimdall : 1.0.2 & already fully sync

OS & Version:  Linux 20.04 lts

Erigon Command (with flags/config): 
`/home/azureuser/node-mumbai/erigon/build/bin/erigon --datadir /home/azureuser/.ethereum/node-mumbai-data/mumbai --ethash.dagdir /home/azureuser/.ethereum/node-mumbai-data/mumbai/erigon-ethash  --snapshots=false --chain=mumbai --db.pagesize=64kb --http=false --private.api.addr=localhost:9090 --bootnodes "enode://209aaf7ed549cf4a5700fd833da25413f80a1248bd3aa7fe2a87203e3f7b236dd729579e5c8df61c97bf508281bae4969d6de76a7393bcbd04a0af70270333b3@54.216.248.9:30303"`

Chain/Network: mumbai

#### Actual behaviour
```

Nov 07 04:57:31 node-mumbai-vm erigon[8657]: [INFO] [11-07|04:57:31.813] [2/15 Headers] Waiting for headers...    from=41842615

Nov 07 04:57:31 node-mumbai-vm erigon[8657]: [INFO] [11-07|04:57:31.822] Started P2P networking                   version=67 self=enode://e9f28353b13a503890cd2bdeb66414c8c71c517f147ec5b1c05338b1611f7aa7989b30f5f78197aeaf1e6304e3d11db017907e56bfc479ac531413e651c23120@127.0.0.1:30304 name=erigon/v2.53.2-4fc8c374/linux-amd64/go1.20.6

Nov 07 05:00:31 node-mumbai-vm erigon[8657]: [INFO] [11-07|05:00:31.813] Req/resp stats                           req=0 reqMin=0 reqMax=0 skel=0 skelMin=0 skelMax=0 resp=0 respMin=0 respMax=0 dups=0
Nov 07 05:00:51 node-mumbai-vm erigon[8657]: [INFO] [11-07|05:00:51.814] [2/15 Headers] No block headers to write in this log period number=41842615 blk/second=0.000 alloc=68.6MB sys=93.5MB invalidHeaders=0 rejectedBadHeaders=0

```

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour
run heimdall docker with mumbai env, download mumbai snapshot for erigon, run erigon with data-dir to that snapshot , and then stuck at 41842615, i not found any doc about invalid header
